abilities.name: Sprout
abilities.description: Creates a ring of trees around the target, trapping them inside. Units trapped inside cannot move out, but can still attack and cast spells.
abilities.notes: Provides vision around the trees. Can be destroyed by tree-cutting effects or quelling blade.

abilities.name: Teleportation
abilities.description: Teleports Nature's Prophet to any location on the map after a short channel time.
abilities.notes: Taking damage doesn't interrupt the teleport. Can teleport to any point on the map.

abilities.name: Nature's Call
abilities.description: Converts trees into treants that follow Nature's Prophet and attack his enemies.
abilities.notes: Can create treants anywhere there are trees on the map.

abilities.name: Wrath of Nature
abilities.description: Summons a bolt of energy that strikes the nearest visible enemy unit, then bounces to nearby enemies. Damage increases with each bounce and deals extra damage to creeps.
abilities.notes: Can target anywhere on the map to start the chain. Deals increased damage to non-hero units.
